views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubWarning: Với bất kỳ phiên bản nào của LNDHub, nhà điều hành có thể theo dõi số dư, giao dịch của bạn, địa chỉ IP mà bạn kết nối và thậm chí hết tiền của bạn.
views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubFriend: Nếu bạn có một người bạn mà bạn tin tưởng và người điều hành một nút lnd, bạn có thể muốn xem xét yêu cầu họ thiết lập một phiên bản LNDHub để bạn kết nối.
views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubUnderst: Tôi hiểu, tạo tài khoản của tôi
views.Settings.AddEditNode.certificateWa: Việc chọn không sử dụng Xác minh chứng chỉ có thể khiến bạn dễ bị tấn công trung gian. Làm như vậy theo quyết định của riêng bạn.
Nếu bạn không xác minh kết nối của mình với cấu hình dịch vụ ẩn VPN hoặc Tor v3, chúng tôi thực sự khuyên bạn nên cài đặt chứng chỉ của nút trên thiết bị này.

views.Settings.WalletConfiguration.delet: Ví LND nhúng cần được kích hoạt mới xoá được. Đặt ví này làm ví đang kích hoạt?
Ví này có kênh đang mở hoặc chờ xử lý. Khuyến nghị nên đóng kênh trước khi tiếp tục, nếu không kênh sẽ bị đóng khi phục hồi.
Ví này có số dư trên chuỗi. Đảm bảo bạn đã dự phòng từ khoá hạt giống trước khi tiếp tục.
views.Settings.AddEditNode.customMailbox: Máy chủ Hộp thư Tuỳ chỉnh
views.Settings.CertInstallInstructions.t: Hướng dẫn Cài đặt Chứng nhận
views.Settings.CertInstallInstructions.g: To install a certificate on Android, copy the certificate file to your device. Then go to Settings > Security > Install from storage. It should detect the certificate and let you add install it to the device. The certificate should have the extension .crt

To install a certificate on iOS, transfer the file to your device. Once you select the file on your device you will be prompted to install it as a profile. You must enable your certificate in General > About > Certificate trust settings. The certificate should have the extension .crt
Ngoài ra, bạn có thể cung cấp hồ sơ có chứng chỉ cho điện thoại của mình trong XCode.
Bạn có thể truy cập chứng chỉ bất kỳ lúc nào trong Thiết lập -> Tổng quan  -> Hồ sơ và xoá đi nếu muốn

Nếu bạn đang kết nối với nút của mình thông qua tên máy chủ bên ngoài hoặc qua Tor, bạn phải thêm tên máy chủ vào chứng chỉ. lnd cung cấp một tùy chọn để thực hiện việc này với tùy chọn TLSExtraDomain trong cấu hình của nó. Bạn sẽ phải xóa và tạo lại chứng chỉ sau khi thực hiện thay đổi.

views.ImportAccount.existingAccount: Tài khoản có sẵn (đã có tiền)
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote: If importing an existing account, ZEUS will initiate a rescan from the block height specified below. Please leave the app open for up to 10 minutes for balances to be reflected accurately
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote2: For best results, set block height to the block right before the first transaction received to this external wallet.
views.ImportAccount.addressesToGenerate: Số lượng địa chỉ để khởi tạo
views.ImportAccount.note: NOTE: Events (deposits/spends) for keys derived from an account will only be detected by LND if they happen after the import. Rescans to detect past events will be supported later on.
views.ImportAccount.success: Nhập tài khoản ngoài thành công
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text1: Nhập tài khoản ngoài là tính năng đang thử nghiệm
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text2: Chọn 'Tôi hiểu' là bạn đồng ý tiếp tục và tự quản lí rủi ro nếu có
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text3: If crafting a channel open with an external account, please follow all instructions on screen and DO NOT broadcast the transaction from anywhere except your ZEUS wallet.

views.Wallet.waitForSync: Nút của bạn cần đồng bộ hoàn toàn để có thể gửi nhận thanh toán. Vui lòng đợi.

views.Wallet.BalancePane.recovery.textAl: Để ZEUS mở cho đến khi hoàn thành.
views.Wallet.BalancePane.backup.title: Sao lưu nguồn vốn của bạn.
views.Wallet.BalancePane.backup.text: Tạo bản backup để không mất quyền truy cập bitcoin của bạn.
views.Wallet.MainPane.error: Lỗi khi kết nối tới nút của bạn. Vui lòng kiểm tra thiết lập và thử lại.
views.Wallet.Wallet.connecting: Zeus đang kết nối với nút của bạn.
views.Wallet.Wallet.loadingAccount: Zeus đang tải tài khoản của bạn.
views.Wallet.Wallet.startingNode: Zeus đang khởi động nút của bạn.
views.Wallet.Wallet.expressGraphSync: Zeus is running express graph sync. Hang tight.
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainerFirs: It is recommended that your first lightning receive be 100,000 sats or more; the larger the better. A setup fee will be deducted from this amount.
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainer: Bạn sẽ bị tính phí thiết lập nếu trả tiền trên Lightning.
views.BTCPayConfigQRScanner.text: Quét cấu hình BTCPay trong Cài đặt > Dịch vụ > LND Rest

views.Channel.lastLocalUpdate: Cập nhật tại chỗ lần cuối
views.Channel.lastRemoteUpdate: Cập nhật từ xa lần cuối
views.Channel.title: Kênh
views.Channel.localReserve.info: The minimum satoshis your node is required to reserve on your side of the channel. It is used to prevent cheating.
views.Channel.remoteReserve.info: The minimum satoshis your counterparty is required to reserve on their side of the channel. It is used to prevent cheating.
views.Channel.csvDelay.info1: CSV delay, or time-lock delay, is a security feature in the Lightning Network that prevents premature channel closings. It's a built-in delay that uses time to enforce security and give both parties time to resolve issues before funds are released.
views.Channel.csvDelay.info2: You will have to wait this duration to access your funds on-chain if you are the initiator of a force close.
views.Channel.externalAddress.info1: If specified, your channel funds will be sent to this external address, instead of an address in the internal wallet.
views.Channel.externalAddress.info2: A close address was set when this channel was opened. Your funds will be sent to this address only, and it cannot be changed.
views.Channel.forceClose.infoText1: Force closes should only be done when the channel partner has been offline for an extended period of time. Typically, the party initiating the force close will have to wait to spend their bitcoin, while the other side can spend their funds immediately.
views.Channel.forceClose.infoText2: The length of the waiting period is defined when the channel is opened. It can range from just a day to a few weeks. This time period may be listed on this page, labeled as 'CSV Delay'.
views.Channel.lease.lspDiscretion: May be closed at LSP's discretion
views.Channel.lease.lspDiscretion.explai: The Lightning Service Provider (LSP) reserves the right to close your channel at any time. Channels with large balances pushed to the LSP's side, are more likely to be closed.
If you would like to ensure your channel remains open, consider purchasing a channel lease.

views.Intro.carousel1.title: Các khoản thanh toán bạn có thể tin tưởng
views.Intro.carousel1.text: ZEUS chạy một nút Bitcoin và Lightning để xác thực và giữ riêng tư cho giao dịch của bạn.
views.Intro.carousel2.title: Các khoản chuyển nhượng trên chuỗi
views.Intro.carousel2.text: Chuyển bitcoin hàng ngày, trên chuỗi với Zeus
views.Intro.carousel3.title: Các khoản thanh toán Lightning
views.Intro.carousel3.text: Thực hiện (gần như) ngay lập tức, phí thấp, thanh toán bằng bitcoin bằng mạng Lightning.
views.Intro.carousel4.title: Kiểm soát Lightning
views.Intro.carousel4.text: Không chỉ là một ví bitcoin cơ bản và quản lý các kênh lightning, tính thanh khoản của bạn, mà còn nhiều hơn thế.
views.Intro.errorCreatingWallet: Lỗi khi tạo ví. Khởi động lại ứng dụng và thử lại.
views.OpenChannel.importText: Đã phát hiện URI nút sau trong khay nhớ tạm của bạn
views.OpenChannel.importPrompt: Bạn có muốn trích nhập vào?
views.OpenChannel.peerSuccess: Kết nối ngang hàng thành công
views.OpenChannel.closeAddressExplainer: An optional address where funds will be sent during a cooperative close. Can only be set when opening the channel and only if the peer supports it. If set, the channel can only be closed to this address.
views.Payment.title: Thanh toán
views.Payment.writeNote: Viết ghi chú của bạn tại đây
views.PaymentRequest.title: Hoá đơn Lightning
views.PaymentRequest.feeEstimateExceedsL: The estimated fee for this payment is higher than the limit set below. Consider raising the fee limit to avoid payment failures.
views.PaymentRequest.mpp: Cố gắng thanh toán đa đường dẫn
views.PaymentRequest.mpp.explainer1: A multi-path payment is a technique used to split a single payment into multiple smaller parts, which are routed through different paths in the network.
views.PaymentRequest.mpp.explainer2: Leave this enabled to have a higher chance of payment success.
views.PaymentRequest.amp: Cố gắng thanh toán đa đường dẫn atomic
views.PaymentRequest.amp.explainer1: Atomic multi-path payments (AMP), are a variation of multi-path payments that are recombined atomically at the destination. Either all parts of the payment succeed together, or none of them do.
views.PaymentRequest.amp.explainer2: This variation is only supported by LND at present.
views.PaymentRequest.maxPartsDescription: Số lượng thanh toán từng phần tối đa có thể được sử dụng để hoàn thành toàn bộ số tiền.
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReady: LND is getting ready to make payments. Please wait.
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReadyRece: LND is getting ready to receive payments. Please wait.
views.PaymentRequest.notAllowedToSend: Ví này không được phép gửi tiền!
views.Receive.title: Nhận
views.Receive.successCreate: Đã tạo hoá đơn thành công
views.Receive.warningLndHub: Please note that LNDHub has a fixed on-chain address
views.Receive.routeHints: Bao gồm các gợi ý về tuyến đường
views.Receive.p2wkhDescription: Một loại địa chỉ hiện đại hơn giúp tiết kiệm phí cho các khoản thanh toán đến và đi.
views.Receive.np2wkhDescription: Chỉ sử dụng khi một dịch vụ dán nhãn địa chỉ SegWit hoặc Taproot của bạn là không hợp lệ.
views.Receive.np2wkhDescriptionAlt: Chỉ sử dụng khi một dịch vụ dán nhãn địa chỉ SegWit của bạn là không hợp lệ.
views.Receive.p2trDescription: Loại địa chỉ bitcoin mới nhất, mạnh mẽ nhất. Chưa được hỗ trợ rộng rãi.
views.Receive.lspExplainerUnified: LSP will take the following amount as a setup fee, if paid over lightning:
views.Receive.lspExplainer: LSP will take the following amount as a setup fee:
views.Receive.lspExplainerRoutingUnified: LSP will take the following amount as a fee, if paid over lightning:
views.Receive.lspExplainerRouting: LSP will take the following amount as a fee:
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer1: The LSP will provide you with 0-conf channels that will allow you to send and receive payments on the Lightning network.
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer2: The LSP will also wrap your invoices, making it easier to receive payments while protecting your privacy.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer1: Route hints provide information to find non-advertised, or unannounced, channels. This allows routing of payments to nodes that are not publicly visible on the network.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer2: It's helpful to toggle route hints on if you're using only unannounced channels, or if someone trying to pay you cannot reach you via your announced channels.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer3: Route hints are automatically enabled when you only have unannounced channels
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer1: Atomic Multi-path Payments (AMP) are a new type of Lightning payments that can be paid multiple times.
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer2: Please note that AMP invoices are currently only compatible with LND nodes.
views.Receive.lspZeroAmt: The LSP is incompatible with zero amounts. An unwrapped invoice has been generated. Your node's public key will be exposed.
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer1: Using blinded paths in your invoice is an advanced privacy technique that allows you to hide your node's' public key, which is typically revealed in most lightning invoices.
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer2: Note that not all wallets support paying BOLT 11 invoices with blinded paths yet, and that the possiblity of payment success may decrease.
views.Send.title: Gửi
views.Send.keysendAddress: địa chỉ gửi chìa khóa (nếu được bật)
views.Send.onChainNotSupported: Gửi trên chuỗi chưa được hỗ trợ trên
views.Send.keysendNotSupported: không hỗ trợ gửi thanh toán keysend hiện tại.
views.Send.lookup: Tra cứu yêu cầu thanh toán
views.Send.noOnchainBalance: No on-chain balance available. Close a channel or receive an on-chain transaction first.
views.Send.noLightningBalance: Không có số dư lightning. Mở kênh hoặc nhận thanh toán lightning trước.
views.Send.zaplockerWarning: This is a Zaplocker invoices that will hold payment up to 24 hours. Open ZEUS regularly after payment to help mitigate the risk of a force closed channel. Proceed at your own risk.
views.SendingLightning.success: Thanh toán đã gửi thành công
views.SendingLightning.lowFeeLimitMessag: This payment may have failed due to a low fee limit. Try again with a higher fee limit
views.SendingLightning.copyPaymentHash: Sao chép hash vào khay nhớ tạm
views.SendingLightning.inTransit: Payment is in transit. It may complete momentarily or it may go on to fail. Check the Activity view to track its progress.
views.SendingLightning.isZaplocker: Zaplocker payment in transit. It may complete momentarily, otherwise funds will return back to you within 24 hours. Check the Activity view to track its progress.
views.SendingLightning.paymentTimedOut: Payment timed out. It may be in transit, meaning it may complete momentarily or it may go on to fail. Check the Activity view to track its progress.
views.SendingOnChain.success: Giao dịch đã gửi thành công

views.Settings.Payments.feeLimitMethodEx: Fee limit method will default to fixed for amounts up to 1000 sats and percentage for amounts greater than 1000 sats. You'll be able to change which method and values to use though, under the Settings section of the Payment Request view.

views.Settings.Invoices.memoExplainer: Một ghi chú mặc định để sử dụng cho hóa đơn của bạn.
views.Settings.Invoices.receiverNameExpl: Một tên người nhận được thêm vào tất cả các hóa đơn của bạn, để giúp người trả tiền xác định người họ đang thanh toán đến.

views.Settings.Privacy.lurkerMode.explai: Chế độ Lurker ẩn các giá trị nhạy cảm bằng cách thay đổi chúng thành các nhân vật Hy Lạp cổ đại.
Đây là cách tuyệt vời để giới thiệu ứng dụng cho ai đó mà không tiết lộ thông tin nhạy cảm của bạn.
Nhấn lâu bất kỳ giá trị ẩn nào để tạm thời tiết lộ dữ liệu thực tế trong vài giây.
views.Settings.Privacy.clipboard.explain: Nếu được bật, ZEUS sẽ đọc các giá trị được sao chép vào khay nhớ tạm và xin phép bạn sử dụng trong ứng dụng.

views.Settings.Seed.title: Ví dự phòng
views.Settings.Seed.text1: 24 chữ sau đây là ví dự phòng của bạn.
views.Settings.Seed.text2: GIỮ CHÚNG AN TOÀN vì bất cứ ai nhìn thấy những từ này đều có thể đánh cắp tiền của bạn.
views.Settings.Seed.text3: Cẩn thận lừa đảo. Nhân viên hỗ trợ ZEUS sẽ không bao giờ yêu cầu bạn cho những từ này.
views.Settings.Seed.text4: Trên màn hình sau, nhấn vào mỗi khung để tiết lộ từ hạt giống.
views.Settings.Seed.backupComplete: Tôi đã sao lưu dự phòng 24 chữ
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousText1: Bạn có muốn sao chép 24 chữ hạt giống đến khay nhớ tạm?
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousText2: NGUY HIỂM. Từ hạt giống của bạn có thể được đọc bởi các ứng dụng khác mà bạn mở. Hãy cảnh giác.
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousButton: Rủi ro - Sao chép từ hạt giống vào khay nhớ tạm
views.Cashu.CashuSeed.title: Export Cashu wallet BIP-39 seed
views.Cashu.CashuSeed.text1: The following 12 words are your Cashu wallet backup. You do not have to save these if you have your 24 word embedded LND wallet seed phrase backed up, but it is useful if you want to import funds into another Cashu wallet.
views.Settings.SeedRecovery.title: Hồi phục ví
views.Settings.SeedQRExport.title: Export HD node root keys
views.Settings.SeedQRExport.pleaseWait: Khởi tạo yprv và zprv. Hãy đợi trong giây lát.
views.Settings.SeedQRExport.warning: WARNING: DO NOT bump a channel opening transaction. This can cause you to lose funds!
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.title: Nút được nhúng
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.NeutrinoPeer: Set the peers you would like to download block headers from and broadcast transactions through.
Connect only to the specified peers
Only connect to the peers specified. Enabling this may slow down block sync, but may be helpful if you're having issues broadcasting transactions.
Not allowing connections to other peers.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.ZeroConfPeer: Set the peers you would like to accept zero conf lightning channels from, other than the LSP.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.expressGraph: Download Lightning network's gossip data on startup. This will make pathfinding when trying to make a payment much more reliable. Restart the app to take effect. Also known as Speedloader.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetExpress: Reset express graph sync on startup
Force a new download of the express graph sync data on startup.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.bimodalPathf: Use the bimodal probability estimator, instead of the default apriori estimator, when attempting to make payments. Restart the app to take effect.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.waitForGraph: Chờ đồng bộ hóa đồ thị trước khi thanh toán
Chờ biểu đồ mạng lightning đồng bộ hóa sẽ tăng xác suất thanh toán thành công.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.rescan.subti: Quét lại blockchain cho các giao dịch trên chuỗi của bạn. Khởi động lại ứng dụng để có hiệu lực. Sẽ được tắt khi hoàn thành.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.compactDb: Cơ sở dữ liệu nhỏ gọn
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.compactDb.su: Whether the databases used within LND should automatically be compacted on startup. This is disabled by default because it increases startup time and requires additional disk space to be available during the compaction that is freed afterwards. In general compaction leads to smaller database files.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.stopLndDelet: Stop LND and delete Neutrino files
Upon restart, blockchain header sync will start from scratch and will take several minutes to complete.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.restart: Khởi động lại để có hiệu lực.
Chạy nút LND của bạn với Tor.
Note that calls to rates and Mempool.space endpoints will still be made on clearnet.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.persistentMo: Tiếp tục chạy nút LND trong nền ngay cả khi ứng dụng được đóng.
Tiếp tục chạy LND và TOR trong nền ngay cả khi ứng dụng được đóng.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetMission: Đặt lại hồ sơ định tuyến thanh toán
This will reset the mission control state. Can be helpful if you are having issues finding routes while making payments.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.automaticDis: Automatically create disaster recovery data and send it to the Olympus backup service. Disaster recovery data can help you recover your lightning funds in the event of a catastrophic failure.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.clipboardDis: This will copy your disaster recovery data to your clipboard. Provide the latest version of this string in the wallet recovery process to trigger a force closure of all your channels. The funds will return to your on-chain wallet.
It's best practice to create new disaster recovery data after each new channel you open if you're not using automatic backups.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.exportDisast: Back up recovery data to Olympus
Manually back up recovery data to the Olympus backup service.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Manually download recovery data from the Olympus backup service and trigger a recovery.
Note that this will close out all your channels and recover their balances to your on-chain wallet once settled.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateAdva: Initiate advanced disaster recovery from Olympus
Manually download older recovery data from the Olympus backup service and trigger a recovery.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Manually restore recovery data from the clipboard.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedDisa: Chọn một bản dự phòng dưới
Tải bản dự phòng thất bại. Vui lòng thử lại sau.
Không tìm thấy bản dự phòng
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedResc: Kick off a rescan from a specific block height

views.BumpFee.title: Tăng tốc giao dịch
views.BumpFee.titleForceClose: Tăng tốc đóng kênh bắt buộc
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer1: An outpoint is a reference to a particular output of a previous transaction. It consists of two parts:
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer2: 1) Transaction ID (txid): This is a unique identifier for a specific transaction on the Bitcoin blockchain.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer3: 2) Output Index (vout): This denotes which specific output of the referenced transaction is being spent.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer4: The two are combined with a : character, for example: a1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d:0
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer5: This is the first output in this transaction, as the output index starts at 0. The second output has vout 1, etc.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer1: The max amount in sats that can be used as the fees. Setting this value greater than the input's value may result in CPFP - one or more wallet utxos will be used to pay the fees specified by the budget.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer2: If not set, for new inputs, by default 50% of the input's value will be treated as the budget for fee bumping; for existing inputs, their current budgets will be retained.
views.BumpFee.immediate.explainer: Whether this input will be swept immediately. When enabled, the sweeper will sweep this input without waiting for the next batch.

views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText1: This service allows you to purchase channels in advance from the LSP directly. Channels must confirm on-chain before you can use them.
views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText2: If you don't want to wait for on-chain confirmation, you can use our just-in-time channel service. The JIT service will create a 0-conf channel of the amount you specify plus 100k sats of inbound (receiving capacity).

views.LSPS7.serviceInfoText1: This service allows you to extend the duration of a purchased channel lease, or purchase a channel lease for a channel you have opened to the LSP.

stores.SettingsStore.lndhubSuccess: Successfully created LNDHub account. Record the username and password somewhere so you can restore your funds if something happens to your device. Then hit Save Wallet Config to continue.
stores.SettingsStore.lndhubError: Lỗi khi tạo tài khoản LNDHub. Vui lòng kiểm tra máy chủ và thử lại.
stores.SettingsStore.lndhubLoginError: Failed to log in to LNDHub server

error.connectionRefused: Không thể truy cập máy chủ. Thử khởi động lại nút của bạn hoặc ứng dụng Tor của nút.
error.hostUnreachable: Không thể truy cập máy chủ. Thử khởi động lại nút của bạn hoặc ứng dụng Tor của nút.
error.nodeConnectError: Unable to connect to node. Please verify the host and port are correct and the service is running.
error.torBootstrap: Error starting up Tor on your phone. Try restarting Zeus. If the problem persists consider using the Orbot app to connect to Tor, or using an alternative connection method like Lightning Node Connect or Tailscale.
error.failureReasonTimeout: There are more routes to try, but the payment timeout was exceeded.
error.failureReasonError: Đã xảy ra một lỗi không thể phục hồi

The receiving node might not accept keysend payments.
error.failureReasonInsufficientBalance: Số dư tại chỗ không đủ
error.invalidMacaroon: Invalid macaroon. Please check that you've entered the correct macaroon for this node.
error.invalidResponse: Received invalid response data from the server
error.serviceConnection: Error connecting to service. Please try again later.
pos.views.Wallet.PosPane.noOrders: No orders open at the moment. To send to ZEUS, mark order as 'Other Payment Type' with a note that includes 'Zeus', 'BTC', or 'Bitcoin'
pos.views.Wallet.PosPane.noOrdersStandal: Hiện tại không có đơn hàng đang mở
pos.views.Wallet.PosPane.noOrdersPaid: Chưa có đơn hàng nào được thanh toán
pos.views.Wallet.PosPane.fetchingRates: Đang cập nhật tỷ giá sàn giao dịch
pos.views.Settings.PointOfSale.authWarni: Cảnh báo: chưa cài đặt mật khẩu hoặc mã PIN
pos.views.Settings.PointOfSale.backendWa: Warning: currently only LND nodes are able to mark orders as paid
pos.views.Settings.PointOfSale.currencyM: Error: currency must be enabled first
views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.restore: Restoring a wallet will trigger a force close of all your channels. Consider closing your channels on your original device first, if possible, to save on fees and recover your funds more quickly.
views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.embedde: It is recommended to close all your channels manually before moving to another device. Restoring without closing out channels beforehand will trigger force closes, which will result in higher fees and can take up to two weeks to recover your funds.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.noPaymen: No payments to redeem. Check back later.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.noNeedTo: No redeem step required. Payments are sent directly to your wallet.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.statusEx: This is the number of payments that can be made to you while you're offline.
More payment hashes will be sent to the server automatically when required, so that you can continue to receive payments.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.nostrKey: Warning: changing your Nostr keys will delete your pending payments. Please redeem your pending payments before submitting new keys.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.explaine: To get started with a lightning address you must first have a lightning channel from the ZEUS LSP with inbound liquidity.
The easiest way to do so is to purchase a 0-conf channel. Just generate an invoice and pay yourself from another lightning wallet.
Purchasing a standard channel will require you to wait for several on-chain confirmation before your channel is useable.
Tự động chấp nhận thanh toán khi khởi động
Thành công và không tìm thấy
Including route hints will help the LSP forward your payment to you using your unannounced channels.
This has a privacy tradeoff in that it will expose your unannounced channels to the LSP.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.deleteAd: Are you sure you want to delete your ZEUS Pay Lightning address? This action cannot be undone.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.expl: This lightning address is hosted and powered by our LSP, OLYMPUS by ZEUS. It allows you to accept payments even when you're offline.

It uses payment hashes generated on your device, and hodl invoices, which means the LSP can only temporarily hold the funds and forward them along to you, or return them to the sender (after a 24 hour expiry period), effectively making it self-custodial.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.pres: Nhấn để đổi thanh toán từ ZEUS PAY.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.notL: Press to lookup attestations on Nostr.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.vali: Attestation is valid. Press to see details.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.inva: Invalid or conflicting attestations. Press to see details.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.noAt: No Nostr attestations found. Sender's wallet likely doesn't support it yet.
views.LightningAddress.ZeusPayPlus.noAct: Không có gói đăng ký kích hoạt
views.Settings.Attestations.title: Attestations
views.Settings.Attestation.title: Attestation
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.title: Chuyển đổi tiền tệ
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.error: Lỗi khi tải tỷ giá. Chạm để thử lại.
views.LspExplanation.title: Những phí này là gì?
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.gr: The wallet you are using is custodial. This means that the funds here are not fully in your control, and can be stolen by the operator of the service.
This wallet is more akin to a bank account than a bitcoin wallet. You don't have access to the bitcoin keys, but rather credentials that can be revoked at any moment.
ZEUS has the ability to create a self-custodial wallet in the app. This wallet provides you with a 24-word seed phrase that gives you full control of your funds.
To get started with your own self-custodial wallet, press the button below, and hit the 'Create mainnet wallet' button on the next screen.
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.di: Vui lòng xác nhận điều sau để tắt thông báo:
Tôi biết rằng tôi không có quyền lưu ký các khoản tiền trong ví này nếu không có 12 hoặc 24 từ hạt giống
Tôi biết rằng mật khẩu tài khoản LNDHub không giống như từ hạt giống
Tôi hoặc tự thiết lập kết nối này hoặc tôi tin tưởng người đã thiết lập nó
Tôi không nói dối để cho xong điều này
views.PayCodes.noPayCodes: Chưa có mã thanh toán nào được tạo
view.Settings.LSPServicesList.title: Dịch vụ LSP
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.Chantools.Sw: The number of keys to scan per derivation path.
Số giây đợi giữa các truy vấn
Dùng để tạm dừng giữa các truy vấn nếu bạn bị giới hạn tần suất bởi API.
views.Settings.Ecash.title: Thiết lập Ecash
views.Settings.Ecash.enableEcash.subtitl: Cashu is a Chaumian ecash protocol built for Bitcoin. It's a custodial solution but with better privacy than a traditional account.

You'll only want to store in Cashu what you can afford to lose, but it can make for a great solution for those who just want to test ZEUS for the first time or don't have enough bitcoin to open a Lightning channel yet.
ZEUS will periodically prompt you to upgrade to self-custody, once you have enough bitcoin to purchase a Lightning channel.
views.Settings.Ecash.sweepThresholdSatsT: Funds will be automatically swept to your self-custodial wallet if the balance you have with a mint exceeds this threshold.
views.LspExplanation.text1: Zeus is a self-custodial lightning wallet. In order to send or receive a lightning payment, you must open a lightning payment channel, which has a setup fee.
views.LspExplanation.text2: Once the channel is set up, you'll only have to pay normal network fees until your channel exhausts its capacity.
views.LspExplanation.buttonText: Tìm hiểu thêm về thanh khoản
views.LspExplanation.buttonText2: Tìm hiểu thêm về cách LSP hoạt động
views.LspExplanationRouting.text1: In order to provide you with some privacy and improve payment performance, the Lightning Service Provider (LSP) will do some heavy lifting for you with a technique called invoice wrapping. The fee is nominal; it's typically just a few satoshis.
views.LspExplanationRouting.text2: You can turn off the LSP entirely and save on these fees by navigating to Settings > Lightning Service Provider (LSP), but you will sacrifice these privacy and payment performance gains.
views.LspExplanationWrappedInvoices.text: Wrapped invoices are invoices with extra layers around them. In this instance, the LSP will wrap an invoice generated from your node. The wrapped invoice will appear as if it is generated by the LSP.

This has two benefits: 1) The end user doesn't have to expose their node's public key to senders. The LSP knows the receiver but no one else does. 2) Senders can use routes to the LSP to make a payment instead of having to find a direct path to the end user.

Wrapped invoices uses the same preimage hash as the original invoice. This means that the LSP can't settle the payment without the final receiver completing the payment, so the LSP can't run away with the user's funds.
Be sure to keep Zeus open when receiving payment as the LSP cannot settle payments on your behalf when you're offline.
views.LspExplanationOverview.title: LSP hoạt động như thế nào?
views.LspExplanationOverview.text1: The LSP uses wrapped invoices and 0-conf channels to instantly connect users to the Lightning network.
views.LspExplanationOverview.text2: All you have to do is have the sender pay the invoice Zeus shows you, but here's what happens under the hood:
views.LspExplanationOverview.step1: The receiver generates an invoices on their lightning node and then sends it to the LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step2: The LSP creates a wrapped invoice and returns it to the receiver
views.LspExplanationOverview.step3: The receiver gives the wrapped invoices to sender for them to pay
views.LspExplanationOverview.step4: The sender pays the invoice, which goes through the LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step5: The LSP detects the payment and opens up a 0-conf, just in time, channel to the receiver
views.LspExplanationOverview.step6: The LSP then forwards the payment to the receiver using that new channel and the payment is completed
views.LspExplanationOverview.buttonText: Tìm hiểu thêm về hóa đơn được đóng gói
views.Sweep.title: Sweep on-chain wallet
views.Sweep.explainer: Sweeping the on-chain wallet will send both the confirmed and unconfirmed balance to the destination address specified above.
views.PSBT.channelWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel ID above is displayed.
views.PSBT.channelsWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel IDs above are displayed.
views.TxHex.channelWarning: No channel loaded in the channel funding flow engine. DO NOT PUBLISH if this transaction is for a channel open.
components.AlertModal.zeusDetected: ZEUS đã phát hiện những vấn đề sau:
components.AlertModal.zombieExplainer: Zombie channels indicate stale data on your downloaded network graph.
components.AlertModal.neutrinoExplainer: Neutrino peers with high ping times can cause performance issues in the app.
views.PendingHTLCs.title: Pending HTLCs
views.PendingHTLCs.recommendationIOS: It's recommended to leave ZEUS running while there are pending HTLCs to prevent force closes.
views.PendingHTLCs.recommendationAndroid: It's recommended to enable Persistent LND or leave ZEUS running while there are pending HTLCs to prevent force closes.

views.Cashu.LightningAddressInfo.explain: This is a custodial Lightning address tied to your Cashu wallet.

It leverages NUT-20 to lock all incoming payments to your Cashu wallet's pubkey. There is no time period in which you must redeem the funds; they are available for you to pull into your Cashu wallet indefinitely.
views.Cashu.UnspentTokens.title: Unspent tokens
views.LightningAddress.NWC.explainer1: This is a self-custodial Lightning address that connects to a remote node using Nostr Wallet Connect (NWC).
views.LightningAddress.NWC.explainer2: Invoices are created directly on your node. There is no need to redeem the funds; they are available on your remote node immediately.

cashu.upgradePrompt.title: Nâng cấp lên Tự lưu ký?
cashu.upgradePrompt.messageGeneral: Your ecash balance is growing! Consider upgrading to a self-custodial Lightning wallet for better security and control over your funds.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message10k: You now have enough sats to purchase your first Lightning channel! Upgrade to self-custody to truly own your bitcoin.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message25k: Your ecash balance is growing! To ensure you can't lose your funds, consider upgrading to a self-custodial Lightning wallet.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message50k: With this balance, it's strongly recommended to move to a self-custodial Lightning wallet. Don't trust, verify!
cashu.upgradePrompt.message100k: High balance detected! It's crucial to upgrade to a self-custodial Lightning wallet now to secure your funds.
zeuspay.intro.explainer1: ZEUS Pay is a service that give you a Lightning address, like satoshi@zeuspay.com, for receiving payments to your Lightning wallet.
zeuspay.intro.explainer2: Below are the kinds of Lightning addresses you can have for your wallet type:
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.redeemInApp: Payments must be redeemed in the ZEUS app
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.settledUponPay: Payments settle on Lightning at time of payment
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.settledUponRed: Payments settle on Lightning when redeemed in the ZEUS app
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.24hrs: Payments must be redeemed within 24 hours or the payment is returned to the sender
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.channelRequire: Requires a channel with the ZEUS LSP, with inbound liquidity
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.automaticallyA: Payments automatically accepted. No need to redeem manually in the ZEUS app.
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.noLspChannelNe: No need for a channel with the ZEUS LSP
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.remotePlusNwc: Requires a remote node with Nostr Wallet Connect
zeuspay.intro.ecash.overview: Just starting your Lightning journey? The Cashu ecash powered address is a great way to get started. Works well on Nostr.
zeuspay.intro.zaplocker.overview: The first-of-its-kind self-custodial Lightning address for mobile wallets.
zeuspay.intro.nwc.overview: Connect directly to your remote node using Nostr Wallet Connect.
